tooltips.authMethod: Defines how the signer will be authenticated: via email token or without additional authentication.
tooltips.role: Signer signs the document, Witness validates, Approver authorizes, Party is involved in the agreement.
tooltips.signingMode: Parallel: everyone signs at the same time. Sequential: sign in the defined order.
tooltips.signerOrder: Number that defines the position in the signing queue (sequential mode).
tooltips.requestEmail: Requests email confirmation from the signer before signing.
tooltips.requestCpf: Requests the signer's CPF for identity validation.
tooltips.requestPhone: Requests the signer's phone number for contact or verification.
tooltips.deadline: After this date, the envelope expires and can no longer be signed.
tooltips.reminder: Sends automatic email reminders to signers who have not yet signed.
tooltips.signingLanguage: Language displayed on the signing screen for signers.
tooltips.closureMode: Automatic: closes when everyone signs. Manual: you decide when to finalize.
tooltips.positionSignatures: Define where each signer should sign or initial on the document.
tooltips.suggestWithAi: AI analyzes the document and automatically suggests signature fields.

signers.title: Define signers
signers.subtitle: Add people who will sign this document

fields.decisionDescription: You can define where each signer should sign on the document, or proceed without positioning fields.

properties.title: Field properties
properties.empty: Select a field to edit its properties.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Set deadlines, reminders and document closure rules
settings.closureAutomaticDesc: The document will be closed automatically when all signers have signed.
settings.closureManualDesc: The document will only be closed when you decide. Useful for documents with flexible deadlines.
settings.closureNote: Regardless of the selected mode, if the deadline is reached, the document will be finalized (with existing signatures) or cancelled (without signatures).

tooltips.primaryColor: Color applied to invitation emails and the signing screen for signers.
tooltips.logo: Logo displayed in emails sent to signers and on the signing screen.
tooltips.defaultLanguage: Default language for the signing screen of new envelopes.
tooltips.defaultReminder: Default automatic reminder interval for new envelopes.
tooltips.defaultClosure: Default closure mode for new envelopes.
tooltips.senderName: Name displayed as the sender in signing invitation emails.
tooltips.certificateUpload: A1 digital certificate (.p12 or .pfx) used to electronically sign documents.
tooltips.certificatePassword: Password defined when exporting the digital certificate. Required for use.

viewStep.instruction: Read the document below before proceeding with the signature.

signer.expired: This document has expired and no longer accepts signatures.

success.title: Document signed successfully!

signDocuments.emptyDescription: Check the information provided and try again.

hero.headline: Send, sign, and track documents with legal validity.
hero.subheadline: Professional electronic signatures for businesses that need security, speed, and legal compliance. No red tape.

pain.headline: Is your signing process still dependent on email, printers, or WhatsApp?
pain.bullet1: Documents sent by email with no tracking and no legal guarantee.
pain.bullet2: Manual processes that delay closings and create rework.
pain.bullet3: No visibility into who signed, when, or if the document was altered.

howItWorks.headline: Three steps. Signature done.
howItWorks.step1Description: Upload your PDF, add signers, and position signature fields.
howItWorks.step2Description: Each signer receives a secure link, views the document, and signs with identity verification.
howItWorks.step3Description: Receive the signed PDF with audit trail, integrity hashes, and legal validity.

features.headline: Everything you need to sign with confidence
features.positionedFieldsDescription: Define exactly where each signer should sign. A guided experience that reduces errors.
features.identityDescription: Email token authentication ensures the person signing is who they claim to be.
features.auditDescription: IP, browser, timestamp, SHA-256 hash. Everything recorded for legal validity.
features.multiSignerDescription: Parallel or sequential signing. Set the order and track in real time.
features.remindersDescription: Set up reminders so no signature stays pending.
features.multiLangDescription: Signing screen in Portuguese or English. For international teams and clients.

pricing.headline: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subheadline: Start for free and scale as your company grows.
pricing.professionalDescription: For companies that need volume and control.

pricing.headline: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subheadline: Start for free and scale as your business grows.
pricing.professionalDescription: For businesses that need volume and control.

differentials.headline: Why Nexosign?
differentials.brazilDescription: Compliant with MP 2.200-2/2001 and Law 14.063/2020. Portuguese interface, CPF support, and local workflows.
differentials.uxDescription: A guided 4-step signing process. No sign-up required, zero friction.
differentials.setupDescription: Create your account, upload a PDF, and have your first document signed today.

socialProof.headline: Trusted by growing companies
socialProof.testimonialQuote: Nexosign simplified our contract signing process. What used to take days now takes minutes, with full legal traceability.

finalCta.headline: Ready to professionalize your signatures?
finalCta.subheadline: Create your account in 2 minutes. No credit card required.

pricingPage.headline: Plans and pricing
pricingPage.subheadline: Choose the right plan for your business. Start for free and scale as you grow.
pricingPage.professionalDescription: For businesses that need volume and control.
pricingPage.faq1Answer: Yes! The Starter plan is completely free and allows you to send up to 5 documents per month. No credit card required.
pricingPage.faq2Answer: Billing is monthly and can be cancelled anytime. You only pay for the active plan, no hidden fees.
pricingPage.faq3Answer: Yes. All signatures comply with Brazilian MP 2.200-2/2001 and Law 14.063/2020, with audit trail, SHA-256 hash, and identity verification.
pricingPage.faq4Answer: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. The difference is calculated proportionally.
pricingPage.faq5Answer: Yes! For higher volumes or specific needs, contact our sales team for a tailored plan.

aboutPage.headline: About Nexosign
aboutPage.intro1: Nexosign was born from the need to simplify document signing for Brazilian businesses. We believe that signing a contract should not be complicated, slow, or insecure.
aboutPage.intro2: We built a platform that combines legal security, exceptional user experience, and compliance with Brazilian legislation, so you can focus on what really matters: your business.
aboutPage.missionText: To democratize access to legally valid electronic signatures, making the process simple, secure, and accessible for businesses of all sizes.
aboutPage.value1Description: Every document is protected with SHA-256 encryption, complete audit trail, and identity verification.
aboutPage.value2Description: An intuitive interface that anyone can use, without training and without friction.
aboutPage.value3Description: We listen to our users and continuously evolve the platform based on real feedback.
aboutPage.value4Description: Fully compliant with Brazilian MP 2.200-2/2001 and Law 14.063/2020, ensuring legal validity.
aboutPage.ctaSubheadline: Start using Nexosign today and simplify your company's signing process.

contactPage.headline: Contact us
contactPage.subheadline: Have a question or need help? We're here for you.
contactPage.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 business hours.

privacyPage.headline: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: Nexosign values your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using our services.
privacyPage.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email, CPF, and contact details when creating your account or signing documents. We also automatically collect data such as IP address, browser, operating system, and platform usage data.
privacyPage.dataUsageText: We use your data to provide and improve our services, process electronic signatures, ensure document security and integrity, send notifications related to your documents, and comply with legal obligations.
privacyPage.dataSharingText: We do not sell your personal data. We share information only with document signers you send to, essential service providers (hosting, email), and when required by law or court order.
privacyPage.dataSecurityText: We employ technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest, SHA-256 hashes for document integrity, strict access controls, and continuous security monitoring.
privacyPage.userRightsText: In compliance with LGPD, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or port your personal data. You can also revoke your consent at any time. To exercise your rights, contact us at privacy@nexosign.com.br.
privacyPage.cookiesText: We use essential cookies for platform functionality and analytical cookies to understand how you use our services. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacyPage.changesText: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on our platform.
privacyPage.contactText: For privacy questions, contact us at: privacy@nexosign.com.br

termsPage.headline: Terms of Service
termsPage.intro: These Terms of Service govern the use of the Nexosign platform. By creating an account or using our services, you agree to these terms.
termsPage.acceptanceText: By accessing or using Nexosign, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use our services.
termsPage.servicesText: Nexosign provides an electronic signature platform that allows you to send, sign, and track documents with legal validity, in compliance with Brazilian MP 2.200-2/2001 and Law 14.063/2020.
termsPage.accountsText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your access credentials and for all activities performed under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
termsPage.usageText: You agree to use Nexosign only for legal and legitimate purposes. It is prohibited to use the platform for fraudulent activities, illegal content submission, unauthorized access attempts, or any use that violates third-party rights.
termsPage.intellectualPropertyText: All content, branding, design, and technology of Nexosign are exclusive property of the company. You retain ownership of documents you upload to the platform.
termsPage.limitationsText: Nexosign is provided "as is". We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability. We are not liable for indirect damages, data loss from misuse, or the content of documents submitted by users.
termsPage.terminationText: You may close your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms, with prior notice when possible.
termsPage.governingText: These terms are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any dispute shall be resolved in the courts of Sao Paulo, SP.
termsPage.contactText: For questions about these terms, contact us at: legal@nexosign.com.br

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Create and manage reusable templates for your documents

empty.title: No templates yet
empty.description: Create your first template to streamline sending recurring documents.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this template

builder.title: Create template

stepDescriptions.info: Define the name, description and category of the template
stepDescriptions.documents: Add the documents that will be part of the template
stepDescriptions.signers: Configure signer slots and their roles
stepDescriptions.variables: Create dynamic variables to personalize the template

builder.variablesSaveError: Failed to save variables. Please try again.

use.title: Use template
use.signersDescription: Assign real people to signer slots
use.titlePlaceholder: Optional - uses template name if empty
use.submitError: Failed to create envelope. Please try again.

tooltips.templateName: Name that identifies the template in the listing. It will be used as the default envelope title.
tooltips.templateDescription: Internal description to organize your templates. It is not shown to signers.
tooltips.templateCategory: Category to filter and organize your templates in the listing.
tooltips.documents: Documents added here will be copied to each envelope created from this template.
tooltips.signerSlotLabel: Name that identifies the signer position (e.g. 'Contractor'). When using the template, you will assign a real person to this slot.
tooltips.signerRole: Defines the type of participation: Signer signs, Witness validates, Approver authorizes.
tooltips.variableKey: Technical identifier (e.g. company_name). Use in the title as '{{company_name}}' for automatic substitution.
tooltips.variableLabel: User-friendly name displayed when filling in the template.
tooltips.variableRequired: If checked, the user must fill in this variable when using the template.
tooltips.variableDefault: Pre-filled value. The user can change it when using the template.
tooltips.wizardFolder: Folder where the created envelope will be stored.
tooltips.wizardTitle: Optional. If empty, uses the template name. Supports variables like '{{company_name}}'.
tooltips.wizardMessage: Message included in the invitation email sent to signers.
tooltips.wizardAutoSend: If checked, the envelope will be sent immediately after creation. Otherwise, it will remain as a draft.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete template?
deleteConfirm.description: This action is irreversible. The template and all its documents will be permanently deleted.
deleteConfirm.error: Failed to delete template. Please try again.

saveAsTemplate.title: Save as template
saveAsTemplate.description: Create a reusable template from this envelope
